snippet: President Yahya Jammeh shuffled three major posts in his government, state television reported, a week after a coup attempt in the West African nation.
abstract: Gambian Pres Yahya Jammeh changes three major positions in his government, in wake of coup attempt.
lead_paragraph: President Yahya Jammeh shuffled three major posts in his government, state television reported, a week after a coup attempt in the West African nation.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
